    • Method Detail

      • getDirectionalAngle

        public static double getDirectionalAngle​(Vector2D frist,
                                         Vector2D second)
        Calculates the the angle between two vectors, where the sign of the angle indicates a clockwise (-) or counter-clockwise (+) rotation. The angle is always between -pi and pi.
        Parameters:
        frist - The first vector.
        second - The second vector.
        Returns:
        The directional angle between them.

      • generateMultipleRandom2DVectors

        public static java.util.List<Vector2D> generateMultipleRandom2DVectors​(int numberOfVectors,
                                                                       Rectangle rectangle)

      • generateRandom2DVector

        public static Vector2D generateRandom2DVector​(Rectangle rectangle)
        Generates a random Vector2D that is contained in the given Rectangle. The random values is inclusive the left and bottom boundary and exclusive the right and top boundary.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - The rectangle in which the vectors should be included.
        Returns:
        A randomly placed vector.

      • generateStandardGaussian2DVector

        public static Vector2D generateStandardGaussian2DVector()

      • generateRandomUnit2DVector

        public static Vector2D generateRandomUnit2DVector()

      • connectToSegments

        public static java.util.List<LineSegment> connectToSegments​(java.util.List<Vector2D> vectors)

      • get2DCentroid

        public static Vector2D get2DCentroid​(java.util.Collection<Vector2D> vectors)
        Computes the centroid of all vectors in the collection by summing them and dividing by the number of vectors in the collection. This is faster than using the general implementation from the Vectors class.
        Parameters:
        vectors - The vectors to calculate the centroid from.
        Returns:
        The centroid.
